member.name: T:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret
member.summary: Caret class used by the SyntaxBoxControl

member.name: F:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret._Position
member.summary: The Position of the caret in Chars (Column and Row index)

member.name: F:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.Blink
member.summary: Used by the painter to determine if the caret should be rendered or not

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.#ctor(Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.EditViewControl)
member.summary: Caret constructor
member.param: The control that will use the caret

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.CropPosition
member.summary: Confines the caret to a valid position within the active document

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveRight(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret right one step. if the caret is placed at the last column of a row the caret will move down one row and be placed at the first column of that row.
member.param: True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveUp(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret up one row.
member.param: True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveUp(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret up x rows
member.param: Number of rows the caret should be moved up
True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveDown(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret down x rows.
member.param: The number of rows the caret should be moved down
True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveDown(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret down one row.
member.param: True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveLeft(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret left one step. if the caret is placed at the first column the caret will be moved up one line and placed at the last column of the row.
member.param: True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveHome(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret to the first non whitespace column at the active row
member.param: True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveEnd(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret to the end of a row ignoring any whitespace characters at the end of the row
member.param: True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveAbsoluteHome(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret to the first column of the active row
member.param: True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.MoveAbsoluteEnd(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves the caret to the absolute end of the active row
member.param: True if a selection should be created from the current caret pos to the new pos

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.CurrentSegment
member.summary: Gets the word that the caret is placed on. This only applies if the active row is fully parsed.
member.returns: a Word object from the active row

member.name: M:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.SetPos(Puzzle.SourceCode.TextPoint)
member.summary: Sets the position of the caret
member.param: Point containing the new x and y positions

member.name: E:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.Change
member.summary: Event fired when the carets position has changed.

member.name: P:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.CurrentWord
member.summary: Gets the word that the caret is placed on. This only applies if the active row is fully parsed.
member.returns: a Word object from the active row

member.name: P:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.CurrentRow
member.summary: Returns the row that the caret is placed on
member.returns: a Row object from the active document

member.name: P:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.LogicalPosition
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Logical position of the caret.

member.name: P:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBox.Caret.Position
member.summary: Gets or Sets the position of the caret.

member.summary: Caret is always confined to the first column when a new line is inserted

member.summary: New lines get their indention from the scoping level.

member.summary: Prevents the control from changing the cursor.

member.summary: The row padding in pixels.

member.summary: The selected index in the infotip.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the image used in the infotip.

member.name: P:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBoxControl.InfoTipCount
member.summary: Get or Sets the number of choices that could be made in the infotip.

member.name: P:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBoxControl.InfoTipText
member.summary: The text in the Infotip.
member.remarks:
The text uses a HTML like syntax. Supported tags are: Set Font size,color and fontname.
: Inserts a horizontal separator line.
: Line break. : Activate/Deactivate Bold style. : Activate/Deactivate Italic style. : Activate/Deactivate Underline style.

member.summary: Gets the Selection object from the active view.

member.summary: Collection of KeyboardActions that is used by the control. Keyboard actions to add shortcut key combinations to certain tasks.

member.name: P:Puzzle.Windows.Forms.SyntaxBoxControl.GutterIcons
member.summary: Gets or Sets the imagelist to use in the gutter margin.
member.remarks: Image Index 0 is used to display the Breakpoint icon. Image Index 1 is used to display the Bookmark icon.
